tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE art_pieces (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    artist VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    year INT,
    starting_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    highest_bid DECIMAL(10, 2),
    auction_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE art_piece ( 
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
    name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, 
    artist VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, 
    price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, 
    auction_id INT REFERENCES auction_house(id) 
);

CREATE TABLE bidding_history (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  art_piece_id INT NOT NULL,
  auction_house_id INT NOT NULL,
  bidder_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  bid_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  bid_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE ArtPieces (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  artist_name VARCHAR(255),
  art_title VARCHAR(255),
  year_created INT,
  estimated_value DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE Bids (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  auction_id INT,
  art_piece_id INT,
  bidder_name VARCHAR(255),
  bid_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
  bid_time TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (auction_id) REFERENCES AuctionHouses(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (art_piece_id) REFERENCES ArtPieces(id)
);

CREATE TABLE AuctionLogs (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  auction_id INT,
  bidder_name VARCHAR(255),
  bid_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
  bid_time TIMESTAMP,
  result VARCHAR(255),
  FOREIGN KEY (auction_id) REFERENCES AuctionHouses(id)
);

CREATE TABLE ArtPieces (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    artist_name VARCHAR(50),
    art_title VARCHAR(100),
    year_created INT,
    starting_price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE Bids (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    bid_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    bidder_id INT,
    art_piece_id INT,
    auction_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (bidder_id) REFERENCES Bidders(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (art_piece_id) REFERENCES ArtPieces(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (auction_id) REFERENCES Auctions(id)
);
